name: Heaven Fallen
description:
Warning: this game's audio may be too loud. Please don't use earphone until you adjusted the volumn.Intro

Welcome, human!

You are the leader of your village, but one day, your people found that something is falling from the sky!

It's your god and their world in heaven!

You must stop them from destroying your own world.

How to play

More blocks will be unlocked during the fight.

When you are ready, build a crown tile to start FINAL WAVE and CHALLENGE GOD!!!

It's really hard so don't build this during your early game stage PLZ.

**And when you build this crown, you will lose all your materials!**

And...

Thanks to my teammates, they are:

Arcobalneo, the programmer.

WDust, the artist.

And also myself: Lighty, the programmer.

Have fun playing our game, and if you like it(or hate it), leave a comment below so we can improve!

Oh and...

Our arrangement was quite tight so... Some art resources and tiles that we intended to make were not finished.

The game is still playable though, but you may have a really hard time trying to win.

Maybe, just let the inevitable come.

Love you all <3
